sentences.english: Finches are small, compact birds 3-10 in. (10-27 cm) long.
sentences.chinese: 雀類體型小而結實，體長10～27公分。

sentences.english: In fact, the finches no longer look very finchlike at all.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，這些達爾文雀的樣子已經不太像雀類了。

sentences.english: Many finches are brightly coloured, often with shades of red and yellow.
sentences.chinese: 許多雀類羽色鮮豔，常有深淺不同的紅色和黃色。
